snippet.title: Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare – Legacy Edition Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/call-of-duty-infinite-warfare-ps4/

Get 2 amazing games for the price of 1 with the Legacy Edition of Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare, which includes #MWRemastered.
 
Save the Earth in Infinity Ward’s gripping new Campaign as Captain Nick Reyes. Suit up into six innovative Combat Rigs, the new Mission Teams progression system, and all the frenetic gameplay you can handle in Multiplayer. Buckle up for an insane 1980s co-op thrill ride in Zombies in Spaceland. And revisit the iconic Campaign and genre-defining Multiplayer of Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare® Remastered, all in one package this holiday season.  
 
Follow us for the latest intel:
Web: http://www.callofduty.com
Facebook: http://facebook.com/CallofDuty and http://facebook.com/InfinityWard
Twitter: http://twitter.com/CallofDuty and http://twitter.com/InfinityWard
Instagram: http://instagram.com/callofduty and http://instagram.com/InfinityWard
Snapchat: callofduty

http://www.callofduty.com

Rated Mature: Blood and Gore, Drug Reference, Intense Violence, Strong Language, Suggestive Themes
